# isPositional

**Instance Property**

A Boolean property that indicates whether the node’s audio is altered based on the position of the node.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPositional: Bool { get set }
```

```swift
var isPositional: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the audio mixer considers the position and velocity of the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKAudioNode] relative to scene’s current [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKScene/listener] node. The mixer applies distance attenuation, doppler shift, and pan effects to the sound. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], then the sound is played normally. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring Audio Nodes

- **avAudioNode**: The audio node’s current audio asset.
- **autoplayLooped**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio should play in a loop when the node is added to the scene.
